document.heading: Rosedale Conservancy Real Property Tax Exemption and Relief Act of 2003

history.narrative: Law 15-11, the “Rosedale Conservancy Real Property Tax Exemption and Relief Act of 2003”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 15-50, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 4, 2003, and April 1, 2003, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on April 16, 2003, it was assigned Act No. 15-57 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 15-11 became effective on June 21, 2003.
